pkgmetadata.longdescription: High-Dimensional Functional Time Series Analysis // Offers methods for visualizing, modelling, and forecasting high- dimensional functional time series, also known as functional panel data. Documentation about 'hdftsa' is provided via the paper by Cristian F. Jimenez-Varon, Ying Sun and Han Lin Shang (2024, doi:10.1080/10618600.2024.2319166).
